name: Simone & Simaria
description:
'''Simone & Simaria''' (sometimes written as '''Simone e Simaria''') was  a Brazilian musical duo consisting of sisters Simone Mendes Rocha Diniz (born 24 May 1984 in [[Uibaí]]) and Simaria Mendes Rocha Escrig (born 16 June 1982 in Uibaí). In 2017, the duo's album competed in the category [[Latin Grammy Award for Best Sertaneja Music Album]].

The duo released "Paga de Solteiro Feliz" ({{Translation|"He Pretends He's Happy Single"}}) on January 5, 2018, a song featuring the Brazilian DJ [[Alok (DJ)|Alok]]. It was produced by [[Alok (DJ)|Alok]] exploring the mix of [[sertanejo universitário|sertanejo]], principal genre of [[Simone & Simaria]], with electronic music, genre of [[Alok (DJ)|Alok]]. It peaked in Billboard Brasil Hot 100 at number 12.
